title: Russia Intensifies Its Propaganda Campaign Against Ukraine
description: A new push by the Kremlin frames the war as a counterterrorism operation and seeks to rally Russians to support the fight, officials and researchers say.
dc:creator: Julian E. Barnes
media:credit: Nanna Heitmann for The New York Times
media:description: A priest blessed new military enlistees at a recruiting office in Moscow this month. By framing Ukraine as the potential nuclear aggressor, Russia can ratchet up tensions over escalating the war without incurring the wrath of its population or further undermining support for President Vladimir V. Putin.
